column1: # "technic" remix - contains some items from the technic modpack
# From technic_worldgen, provides all nodes, craftitems, ore distributions, and the rubber tree
# The craft recipes for some ingots require a (technic) alloy machine. If technic is not loaded,
#       unilib provides alternative craft recipes using just the crafting grid and an ordinary
# Technic's tree tap is modified to work with the rubber tree, if that package is executed
# Unilib creates uranium ores/lumps, but the corresponding uranium ingot/block is only created if
#       technic is not loaded (otherwise, nuclear power would not be available to the player)
